name: Lodus
description:
Lodus is a game about electricity and magnets. Navigate the world with your bar magnet and see what you can find. This is an alpha version, including the first six levels.

This is the first public release of Lodus. A beta version is scheduled for publication by the end of the year.

The game was made by Haley, Evelyn, and Jessie. You can keep up to date with our projects here. If you want to contact us with questions, comments, or bug reports, please email us at cyberseainteractive@case.edu.
